statement.p: A physician ordered Lexapro (escitalopram oxalate) 10 mg. Lexapro (escitalopram oxalate) has a concentration of 5 mg per 5 milliliters.
What volume should be administered? mL

solution.p: The unit suggest we can multiply. \displaystyle{10}\ \text{ mg}\cdot\frac{{{5}\ \text{ mL}}}{{{5}\ \text{ mg}}}={10} mL
By dividing we determine how many 5 mg units we need to deliver the total 10 mg.
